Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory4.jpg'}
{3: 'In the ashen city, a girl sits on a broken beam in front of the ruins, her head swinging from one side to the other as she recites dialogues from who-knows-where.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Even though we are in this apocalyptic urban jungle, and it is not an easy quest, we still have to gain it!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Victory! I mean victory!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She jumps down from the ruins, nodding with her hands on her hips.'}
{3: 'Beside her are some mechanoids who somehow show no signs of infection.'}
{2: 'Martin', 3: 'So... Why did you call a bunch of mechanoids here all of a sudden?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "No, you're doing it wrong! We should start with introductions. Hi, I'm Nanami, nice to meet you!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Martin', 3: "Well, I'm Martin...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Nooo, you are... you are a knight!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Martin', 3: 'Knight? What knight?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'The knight I appointed! Just now!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Archerâ€”Rohacchi!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rohacchi', 3: 'Rohacchi, an archer.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "There seems to be a medieval roleplaying game somewhere in the M.I.N.D. What's it called? I remembered the keyword is... right, it's assassins!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Good, you are the assassins. What else... Hmm... Guard!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "That one over there, right, you're the guard!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Martin', 3: 'It seems that your "third partner" can\'t understand what you\'re saying...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Don't worry about it!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Anyway, can you see the tower over there?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She points at a gray tower behind her, its spire hidden in the cloudy sky, its top concealed.'}
{2: 'Martin', 3: 'You are not climbing that, are you?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "You got me! Come on, Nanami's army, let's march to the top of the tower!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Martin', 3: 'So, is this some kind of roleplaying game...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'It should have a name. How about "50 Levels of Gray Tower"?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rohacchi', 3: 'Do Rohacchi, go too?', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'All of you are going!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Nanami puts her hand up, and the mechanoids around her respond by gently swaying along with her movement.'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'The path to victory is to strategically capture each level of the Gray Tower and save the trapped princess...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Martin', 3: 'Is there a real princess up there?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Maybe! It has to be something special, nonetheless!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rohacchi', 3: 'As long as, I stay with you.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Martin', 3: "I guess I'll treat it as cleaning up the city...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "So, say goodbye to this place! We'll be victorious with our might and skills! Nanami's army, charge!", 4: '1'}
